title: Head on Column as Amulet
period: Late Period, Saite Period, or later
description:
Head of Mut on papyrus column, in pale green faience, as amulet. Double crown on head. Details of capital incised. Front of column decorated with papyrus clump in relief; balance of column plain. Pierced through back of head. 

Condition: Currently in two pieces. Glaze worn. Base of column hollow (for attachment).
credit_line: Gift of Evangeline Wilbour Blashfield, Theodora Wilbour, and Victor Wilbour honoring the wishes of their mother, Charlotte Beebe Wilbour, as a memorial to their father Charles Edwin Wilbour

museum_location.name: This item is not on view
